question:
What is the percentage of the customers who used EUR in 2012/8/25?
'2012/8/25' can be represented by '2012-08-25'
query: SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN T2.Currency = 'EUR' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / NULLIF(COUNT(T1.CustomerID), 0) FROM transactions_1k AS T1 INNER JOIN customers AS T2 ON T1.CustomerID = T2.CustomerID WHERE T1.Date = '2012-08-25'
